activity.title: coronasafe/leaderboard#240
activity.text:
> Let's also have a dedicated `/releases` page which will show more number of releases along with their markdown contents, like how we have in [`/projects`](https://contributors.ohc.network/projects)
> 
> And in the home page, let's show only recent 5 releases, the page feels like there's so much vertical content that needed.

- added releases page with a similar markdown as the projects section 
- reduced releases on home page to 4 (was looking more clean instead of 5)

activity.title: coronasafe/leaderboard#240
activity.text: Hey @rithviknishad we need to add a personal access token in the env file. I accidentally pushed my access token in the commit thanks to git-guardian it automatically got deleted from my GitHub profile. We can add GitHub personal access token, this is to call the graphql API endpoint.
